data.title: 15 hottest telenovela couples
data.meta_description: Revisit the unforgettable romances of the best telenovelas of all time
data.text:
01 de 15

ERIK ESTRADA, LAURA LEÓN AND BIBY GAYTÁN

TELENOVELA Dos mujeres un camino (Two women, one road) (1993)

STORY Johnny (Estrada) is a truck driver happily married to Ana Maria (León) until he meets Tania (Gaytán). His life gets even more complicated when both women become friends not knowing that they both love the same man. Meanwhile, Johnny is threatened for allegedly killing the son of a powerful man, the feared Ismael Montegarza (Enrique Rocha).

02 de 15

DANIELA CASTRO AND JUAN SOLER

TELENOVELA Cañaveral de pasiones (Passion cane field) (1996)

STORY Julia Santos (Castro) is hated by her stepfather and the whole town due to the infidelity they all believe her mother had committed. Since he was little, Pablo (Soler) dreamed of Julia's love and it becomes a reality when she gives him a chance.

03 de 15

ADELA NORIEGA AND FERNANDO COLUNGA

TELENOVELA Amor real (Real love) (2003)

STORY Matilde Peñalver (Noriega) is her family's only hope to escape financial despair, so they drive her away from the man she loves to marry Manuel Fuentes Guerra (Colunga), whom she ends up accepting and loving after attempting to run away with her former love.

04 de 15

ANGÉLICA RIVERA AND FRANCISCO GATTORNO

TELENOVELA La dueña (The wild one) (1995)

STORY Regina Villareal (Rivera) seems to have everything: beauty, fortune, and a man who says he loves her. When the wedding day comes, he leaves her waiting at the altar and as a result she turns into an authoritarian woman. José María (Gattorno) falls for her strong character despite the fact that everyone hates her. She gradually begins to give in until she loses her mind over José María.

05 de 15

ANGÉLICA ARAGÓN AND ARI TELCH

TELENOVELA Mirada de mujer (From a woman's perspective) (1997)

STORY María Inés (Aragón) looks at herself in the mirror and sees a woman who has only lived for her own family. When she turns 50 her husband leaves her for another woman and her mother blames her for not keeping her family together. Defeated and hopeless, she runs into Alejandro Salas (Telch), a writer 20 years her junior, who wants to give her the chance to be loved.

06 de 15

GRECIA COLMENARES AND VÍCTOR CÁMARA

TELENOVELA Topacio (1984)

STORY Topacio (Colmeres) is a poor, blind girl who falls in love with Jorge Luis (Cámara), a young man who has inherited a fortune that doesn't belong to him. Topacio recovers her eyesight and finally gains Jorge Luis' love.

07 de 15

MARGARITA ROSA DE FRANCISO AND GUY ECKER

TELENOVELA Café con aroma de mujer Coffee with a woman's aroma) (1994)

STORY Gaviota (De Francisco) works at the coffee plantations where she meets Sebastián Vallejo, the wealthy coffee exporter's son who is stunned by her beauty. Gaviota becomes pregnant but when she becomes aware of her situation, Sebastián has gone back to Europe. She decides to find him and joins a modeling agency to travel to Europe, not knowing that the agency is actually a prostitute ring. Gaviota becomes an important woman in the coffee business and when she faces Sebastián again – already married – the old love flame begins to burn again.

08 de 15

EDITH GONZÁLEZ AND EDUARDO PALOMO

TELENOVELA Corazón Salvaje (Wild At Heart) (1993)

STORY Juan del Diablo (Palomo) is an uneducated pirate who discovers his real father when the man dies and decides to leave him his last name. By coincidence, he and Andrés, his half-brother, fall in love with Aimeé, the sister of Mónica Altamira (González), who decides to conquer Juan Diablo to prevent her sister's adultery after marrying Andrés. In the end, Mónica discovers the tender heart inside that wild man.

09 de 15

THALÍA AND EDUARDO CAPETILLO

TELENOVELA Marimar (1994)

STORY The innocence and humility of Marimar (Thalía), a young girl who lives in a hut with her grandparents and a flea-laden dog lead her to steal food from a mansion. There she meets Sergio Santibáñez (Capetillo) and falls head over heels for him not knowing that he is only proposing to marry her to humiliate his family. Many situations develop before she can find happiness.

10 de 15

ADELA NORIEGA AND ERNESTO LAGUARDIA

TELENOVELA Quinceañera (1987)

STORY Maricruz (Noriega) is a girl born into a wealthy family who falls in love with Pancho (Laguardia), a mechanic from a low social status. Maricruz's mother does not approve of the romance, but they do whatever it takes to never separate and live the typical experiences of the young.

11 de 15

ANA MARÍA OROZCO AND JORGE ENRIQUE ABELLO

TELENOVELA Yo soy Betty la fea (Ugly Betty) (1999)

STORY All employees of Eco Fashion envy Beatriz Pinzón Solano's (Orozco) intelligence. However, she is ugly and her colleagues make fun of her. She becomes the right-hand assistant of the company's president, Armando Mendoza (Abello), who later discovers that behind the unattractive woman –who is radically transformed– lies a big heart.

12 de 15

LUCERO AND FERNANDO COLUNGA

TELENOVELA Alborada (Dawn) (2005)

STORY Hipólita Díaz's (Lucero) adultery with Luis Manrique Arellano (Colunga), a businessman wanted by the law, makes her mother happy with news that she is pregnant. When Hipólita reunites with Luis, she falls in love with him not knowing he is the father of her son.

13 de 15

THALÍA AND FERNANDO COLUNGA

TELENOVELA María la del barrio (1995)

STORY María Hernández (Thalía) grew up in poverty with her godmother, but when she dies, she asks a friend to help her find a job as a maid. That is how María arrives at the house of wealthy and irresponsible Luis Fernando de la Vega (Colunga). María falls in love with Luis Fernando and he flirts with her in jest not imagining the love he will find in her. But not all is happiness. The couple has to fight against evil Soraya who is out to separate them.

14 de 15

KATE DEL CASTILLO AND GUY ECKER

TELENOVELA La mentira (The lie) (1998)

STORY Demetrio Azunzolo (Ecker) swears he will revenge his brother's death caused by a woman. His only lead is that her name begins with V and he gets confused when he meets sisters Verónica (Del Castillo) and Virgina Fernández-Negrete. Virginia then makes him believe that it was her sister who prompted his brother to commit suicide. The plan, however, doesn't work because Azunzolo falls in love with Verónica, which leads Virginia to incur in all kinds of behavior just to cover up what she had done.

15 de 15

REBECCA JONES AND ALEJANDRO CAMACHO

TELENOVELA Cuna de lobos (Wolves' cradle) (1986)

STORY Catalina Creel (Rubio) is an unscrupulous woman who poisons her husband to inherit his fortune. When the man's son, Alejandro (Camacho) learns that the fortune would go to a first grandson, he has a son out of wedlock to claim the inheritance. But wife Vilma (Jones) gets cancer and he repents.
